# Content

This lecture will be available on Wednesday 31 of March 2021

# Set up

For this lecture we need to packages PlackettLuce, ggplot2, gosset, igraph and leaflet. We load the packages with `library()`. Additionally, we load some extra functions from the workflow employed in the [ClimMob platform](https://doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.3976631).

```{r eval=FALSE, message=FALSE}
library("PlackettLuce")
library("ggplot2")
library("gosset")
library("igraph")
library("leaflet")
source("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/AgrDataSci/ClimMob-analysis/master/R/functions.R")
```
